text: Good morning! I am in hopes you will share your earning as I have to a charity close to me heart called Save the Children.
Goodmorning! I would love to hear more about Save The Children
Many details are here on this web site.  URL
Thank you, I will look. Can you tell me how much the donations goes toward the charity?
Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
It sounds like a great charity! I am reading a bit about it now.
It is a great thing for children! Each donation is essential to help ensuring children's rights to health, education and safety. I plan to donate my payment for this task as every little bit helps.
I think it's important that children's rights are protected. So many times they are forgotten. I would also be willing to donate as well.
Each donation will go to a trust-able fund for the children which makes me trust and know my donation is going to the right place and for the right reason.
that's great. I'm weary of certain charities but this one sounds legitimate
I too am weary of such charities but this one has all the information and facts are checked to ensure it is the real deal.
Great. I want donations to actually get to those who need them
Exactly my thoughts!!  Small donations will indeed help a lot of children and their families
and looking at the website- even the small donations help a great deal
Yes they do!! I think about how I have not given much thought to when I buy a bag of candy or a snack but the small amount I spend could mean big help for them.
Exactly, the money I spend on coffee or other non-essentials could be put to much better use

I am glad you too see the benefit of small change to make a huge change for the children!! I am going to donate my payment from this task, how much do you think you would be willing to donate from this task?
I am willing to donate the entire amount I would have recieved from the task
That is truly awesome!! Together we are going to help make small change into something bigger!!
It's a good way to start the day :)
